text: The MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth-007 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the port selection could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 is good, but I expected a bit more from the fan noise on the MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth-007 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth-007 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

The MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth-007 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the trackpad could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth-007 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
